spec.name: Youth Hostel Casablanca
spec.description: The Youth Hostel Casablanca (Auberge de Jeunesse de Casablanca) is a historically important accommodation facility for travelers. It is noted as the **oldest youth hostel in Morocco**, established in the 1930s, predating the official network in the country. Located near the historical core, it has provided affordable lodging for young travelers and backpackers for decades, reflecting a long history of youth tourism and cultural exchange.

timeline.title: Establishment Period
timeline.description: The youth hostel was established, making it the oldest in Morocco (Approximate date).
